Text.content: The group widget is a special select box that offers a list of groups within OpenCms.

Image.Title: The dialog for group selection, shown in the figure, pops up when the folder icon at the widget's edit line is clicked. Select a group by clicking on it.

Text.name: Text0
Text.content: The widget must be chosen via a layout node. It has no extra configuration attribute.
